body.p: Paragraph 19 of IFRS 3 requires such share options to be measured at their acquisition‑date fair value, unless another measurement basis is required by IFRSs. Paragraph 30 of IFRS 3 states that the acquirer shall measure an equity instrument related to share‑based payment transactions of the acquiree in accordance with the method in IFRS 2.
